::KitKat::

She stayed in wolf mode.  She came up to the bot that used to be 
Rowdy.
"Rowdy? Don't you know me? It's me KitKat. Don't you remember me? We 
were friends."
She hoped he would at least remember that they were friends or 
something like that.  
"Please Rowdy, remember. We faught together. Don't you know me?"
